description:
Be the first to Gain Knowledge of Subtractive Sound Design In a very easy way. 85 Different Popular EDM Sounds. Any Rookie can benefit from this course.

This course is all about Sound Designing. The Course is focused on Sylenth1 Subtractive Synth. Course Covers 85 Different Popular Sound Designs which are used In Electronic Dance Music Productions. There are 85 individual Video tutorials on Lead, Pluck, Bass, Pad, Arpeggios, Percussion's & Fx. Anyone can learn to design their own sound within few minutes. Anyone who is into Electronic Dance Music Productions can benefit from this Course. Learning is very easy because you just have to look and learn.
title: Look & Learn - Sylenth1 Sound Design Simplified
